title: *Oak Tree Apartments* Studio Apartments $849 All Utilities Included!
map_address: 110 S Bruce St near Fremont / Bruce
posting_body: ['Oak Tree Apartments', 'Property Address', '110 S Bruce St', 'Las Vegas, NV, 89101', 'We are a Downtown community with all utilities and cable TV included.', 'We are a gated community with off-street parking, on-site laundry facilities, a sparkling pool, and a BBQ area.', 'We are close to bus lines, shopping, gaming, restaurants, and health care facilities.', 'Clean, quiet, and comfortable living at an affordable rate.', '                                                                                            .', 'Floor Plan Details', 'Name: 1ST-FLOOR STUDIO', '0 Bedrooms / 1 Bathrooms', '275 Sq.', 'Ft.', '$849.00', 'Community Amenities', 'Pool', 'Smoke-Free Apartments', 'Freeway Access', 'Public Transportation', 'Courtyard', 'Pet Policy', 'We are pet friendly and allow cats / dogs (up to 40lbs; no aggressive breeds; please call our staff with questions regarding breeds).', 'Please note, Oak Tree has the following pet fees:', '$200 non-refundable pet fee', '$25 monthly pet rent (per pet)', 'Office Hours', 'Monday - Friday 8:00 A.M. - 5:00 P.M.', 'Property Contact', 'show contact info', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY']
